blocks.latex: D\left( p + qD \right)\text{ operating on the function } a\sin(bt+c)
blocks.description: The application of the operator D on a function.
Result of applying the operator to the sine function.

blocks.latex: D\left( p + qD \right)(a\sin(bt+c)) = a\left(p\sin(b t + c) + q b \cos(b t + c)\right)\text{ (See Part I, p. 277) }
D\left( p + qD \right)(a\sin(bt+c)) = a\frac{p}{p^2 + q^2}\sin\left(bt + c - \tan^{-1}\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)\right)
